channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: USDA must make full SNAP payments after judge denies bid to halt them
item.description: President Trump's request to block a judge's ruling requiring his administration to pay SNAP benefits in full by Nov. 7 was denied Friday by an appeal...

item.title: Trump pardons retired New York cop convicted of acting as Chinese agent
item.description: The former NYPD officer was sentenced to 18 months in prison in April on charges he stalked a New Jersey couple as part of a Chinese government plot.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump from deploying National Guard in Oregon
item.description: The judge, who was appointed by Trump, said the attempted deployment in Portland exceeded the president’s authority.

item.title: On Trump’s urging, Justice Dept. investigating foreign meatpackers
item.description: Only a handful of large meatpackers control the industry in the U.S. as a result of consolidation.

item.title: Trump administration asks Supreme Court to block order on releasing SNAP benefits
item.description: A federal judge had directed the administration to release full benefits for November. The administration is appealing the order.

item.title: Trump orders Justice Department probe of meatpackers over prices
item.description: President Trump on Friday said he would order the Justice Department to investigate the meatpacking industry for alleged collusion and price fixing . ...

item.title: Democrats name their price on ending government shutdown
item.description: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer (D-N.Y.) said Friday that Democrats would vote to end the government shutdown in exchange for a one-year extensio...

item.title: House Democrats back off another one of their red lines on ending the shutdown
item.description: House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries (D-N.Y.) on Friday signaled his openness to a proposed one-year extension of expiring Affordable Care Act tax cr...

item.title: Shutdown burnout is making members of Congress rethink their reelection plans
item.description: House members were already fleeing their chamber in droves, either to seek higher office or simply walk off into the sunset. Then the government shut ...

item.title: This North Carolina Democrat can’t win her district. So she’s running as a Republican.
item.description: In her crusade against gerrymandering, Kate Barr is challenging her Republican congressman in the GOP primary to make a point.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
